data.text: @reginapolice But, any COVID-19 Protocols which vary between provinces are "inconsistent" with section 52 of the Constitution Act 1982, CCC, and Canadian Charter, which includes All Your Brothers and Sisters in each and every province,see the Contradiction? no Offence intended, BE SAFE👍🇨🇦

@reginapolice Guess Police are no longer Essential Workers, but what are the Requirements when taking an Accused into Custody, vaccinated or non-vaccinated, or Transporting an Accused to a Court, what Requirements, Criminal Code of Canada is an "Act" of Parliament, Attorney General of Canada

The Communication Center (9-1-1) will continue risk assessment protocol on Calls for Service to determine COVID risk. The info will be provided to front line members who will continue to use proper PPE like masks when needed or at the request of the public. #yqr 3/3 https://t.co/WufkXE43nB
Appointments for Criminal Record checks will continue for the immediate future. #yqr 2/3 https://t.co/v8z8Lifvnv
